name: SnakesSweeper.io
description:
Overview

SnakesSweeper.io combines Snake.io and Minesweeper toghether to create a challenging, but fun game. Avoid bombs and  snakes. Reveal the squares and kill other snakes with your tail to gain points. The last standing snake wins!

Game Controls

Mouse to navigate the UI, keys 'a' and 'd' to move left or right, 'esc' to pause, 't' to skip the tutorial!

Note

The game does not stores saves :(
